title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.13 - Extension of time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.13 - Extension of time

State Regulations

The Banking Board, or such member or members as it may
designate, may extend the time for the commencement or continuance of any
hearing before the Banking Board, or for the service and filing of any paper or
document authorized or required by this Part to be filed with the Banking

Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
